ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
RecordTypeId="012700000001jeX" || RecordTypeId="012700000001kKx"|| RecordTypeId="0120g000000l3qD",
OR(ISBLANK(NCS_Benefits_Specialist__c),ISBLANK(NCS_Payroll_Specialist__c)),NOT(ISBLANK( Sent_to_WC_Underwriting__c )),NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Admin')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Benefits NCS and Payroll NCS are required when Sent to WC Underwriting is filled in.
